channel.title: [PI] Show slayer Points when open shop [PI] Rep++
channel.description:
i've trying to add that if you open the slayer point shop it tell's u how many slayer points u have.
i will give u the code i tryed but it wont show up for me.
[code] case 1598: c.getShops().openShop(48); c.sendMessage("You currently got <col=255>"+c.magePoints+"</col> Slayer Points");[/code]
the 1598 is the NPC ID of the shop the 48 is shop 48
and c.magePoints is the variable of the slayer points.
i will rep++ the one who can help me with this
